rows.label: qst201411_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard about this from Nia,
but are you two still at it?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0002
rows.name:
Just in time, Meleph. Judge which
of us has more Girl Power.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0003
rows.name:
I only came for a drink of
water... But very well.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0004
rows.name:
Say, Meleph, are you
interested in romance at all?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0005
rows.name:
I am a soldier of the
Superbian Empire...

rows.label: qst201411_msg0006
rows.name:
If I had time for such things, I
would spend it on training myself.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0007
rows.name:
Isn't it boring to just
fight all the time?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0008
rows.name: Not at all.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0009
rows.name:
The act of training with one's
comrades and improving each other...

rows.label: qst201411_msg0010
rows.name:
...is, in my opinion, a most
interesting and meaningful endeavor.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0011
rows.name:
You're too serious, Meleph.
Shouldn't you relax and
have fun sometimes?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0012
rows.name:
No... It's not just you, Hikari
and Zakuro, but I think our
Blades are too free-spirited.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0013
rows.name:
In the Superbian army, even
Blades live a disciplined life.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0014
rows.name:
Chatting all night is out of the
question. Shouldn't you be in
perfect condition for tomorrow?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0015
rows.name:
A first-class warrior must
always be honing themselves.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0016
rows.name:
Especially if you are still
inexperienced. You must cast aside
indulgence and live a life of rigor.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0017
rows.name: U-Um... Meleph-san...?

rows.label: qst201411_msg0018
rows.name:
We've heard your point loud
and clear, so perhaps we could
end this topic here...

rows.label: qst201411_msg0019
rows.name: No, that is not enough.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0020
rows.name:
You two must reaffirm your
resolve as warriors.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0021
rows.name:
Sit there and listen. Do not
even think of trying to escape.

rows.label: qst201411_msg0022
rows.name: Nooo!
